mapper.select: SELECT f.id AS folderId, f.name AS folderName, f.program_id AS programId, t.name AS programName FROM folder f LEFT JOIN program t ON f.program_id = t.id WHERE f.id != 1
SELECT id AS folderId, name AS folderName, p_id AS folderParentId, program_id AS programId FROM folder WHERE p_id = #{p_id}
SELECT f.id AS folderId, f.name AS folderName, f.program_id AS programId, t.name AS programName FROM folder f LEFT JOIN program t ON f.program_id = t.id WHERE f.program_id = #{programId}

SELECT f.id AS folderId, f.name AS folderName, f.program_id AS programId, t.name AS programName FROM folder f LEFT JOIN program t ON f.program_id = t.id WHERE f.program_id = #{programId} AND f.p_id = 1;
SELECT f.id AS folderId, f.name AS folderName, f.program_id AS programId, t.name AS programName FROM folder f LEFT JOIN program t ON f.program_id = t.id WHERE f.id != 1 AND f.p_id = 1;

WITH RECURSIVE C AS ( SELECT id FROM folder WHERE id = ${folderId} UNION ALL SELECT f.id FROM folder f JOIN C rf ON f.p_id = rf.id ) SELECT c.id AS clip_id, c.program_id, t.name AS `program_name`, c.folder_id, f.name AS `folder_name`,
cm.clip_uuid, cm.file_name, cm.file_ext, cm.file_path, cm.format_long_name, cm.file_duration / 60 AS file_duration, ROUND(cm.file_size / (1024 * 1024), 2) AS file_size, DATE(c.ingest_at) AS ingest_at, DATE(c.end_at) AS end_at, c.del_fl FROM clip c LEFT JOIN ingest i ON i.id = c.ingest_id LEFT JOIN program t ON t.id = c.program_id LEFT JOIN folder f ON f.id = c.folder_id LEFT JOIN convert_metadata cm ON cm.id = c.convert_metadata_id WHERE c.folder_id IN (SELECT id FROM C) ORDER BY c.end_at DESC;
